entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Golden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:59 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 0.3°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
